Acutally I dont recall ever being spoken to about taking more damage then my 
charachters would. As only the Vile Force were ever in a battle and they got 
whooped. Not to mention the only Infecticon in combat up until now was 
Hellpeon and I was asked to use the Chaochitan barriers less frequently then 
he did. And Dewboy you did 3 attacks in 3 posts. Not to mention your 
charachter was damaged badly before the new guy arrived. You shouldn't expect 
fresh charachter to take as much damage as mutate has. Heh and one attack 
would have hit him if not for the miniscule barrier he had for that one post. 
And if it was unstable energon mutate fired it would have blown him to 
pieces. Mutate used some freakishly powerful sonic attack as best I can 
figure it. ANd those are illegal.

--part1_9e.1cc036bb.2915c6f9_boundary
